Description:
Alien Rage - a sci-fi first person shooter in the arcade style, created on the engine, Unreal Engine 3. You have to get used to the role of highly skilled elite commando and go on a mission to destroy the aliens. In Alien Rage waiting for you 14 levels, a variety of enemies to fight with which to use different strategies, 10 kinds of deadly weapons that have both main and secondary firing mode, spectacular battles with bosses and many more.

Features:

The developers claim that the game will be a few companies, coop and a single. Campaigns will be greatly differ such as you are in the first group going through the explosion and killing all in a row, the second in a stealth mode.
The plot for an Oscar is not going to go, but here everything is decided by guns, 10 types of weapons, an incredible battle with 8 scary and huge bosses and 14 levels. The game itself is being developed on the Unreal Engine 3 and will be released this year.
